title: "My Heart Has Joined the Thousand, For My Friend Stopped Running Today"
content: Hydropsyche created a post about life after running and how athletes cope with age. In the comments, gmatom shared the moving story of her and her wife and how they fell in love with running through the course of their marriage. This love continued through the awful arrival of cancer and dwindling health to cross a personal finishing line of their own making.
author: Brandon Blatcher
